SEARCH
Package ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller

Class RegisterController

java.lang.Object
ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller.RegisterController
@Controller public class RegisterController extends Object
Controller for handling user registration requests. Provides endpoints for displaying the registration page and processing registration submissions.

  • Method Details

    • showRegisterPage

      @GetMapping("/register") public String showRegisterPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the registration page.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the registration view template

    • register

      @PostMapping("/register") public String register(@RequestParam String username, @RequestParam String password, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes a user registration request. Registers a new user with the "USER" role and redirects to the login page on success. Displays an error message on the registration page if the username already exists.
      Parameters:
      username - the username for the new user
      password - the password for the new user
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template to render (either "login" or "register")
